title: Polymer coating assisted shaping of metal–organic framework particles into pellets with enhanced methane uptake
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00178H, Paper
Chunhui Wu, Xinxin Chu, Dejun Dai, Xiaoling Wu, Dongxu Wang, Yu Tao, Yue-Biao Zhang, Tao Li
Compacting well-defined HKUST-1@polyimide core–shell particles instead of pristine HKUST-1 can result in more densely packed pellets with less structural damage, thus leading to enhanced volumetric methane storage.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
